title: Ebert & Roeper - 06.08.08 - Best & Worst of 2008, So Far
description:
NOTE:  Last week&#039;s show did not air in this area.
--------------------------------------------------------------------

Ebert & Roeper  -  June 8th, 2008 - Best & Worst Movies of 2008, So Far - with guest host [url=http://www.chicagotribune.com/features/chi-michaelphillipscritic,1,931773.storygallery?coll=chi-entertainment-utl]Michael Phillips[/url], film critic for the Chicago Tribune

-------------------------------------------------
SPOILERS - The following list gives the thumbs up or thumbs down vote which the movies received.  (Phillips - Roeper)
-------------------------------------------------

	------------ Roeper&#039;s picks ------------
		--- The Best
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0800039/]Forgetting Sarah Marshall[/url]
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0857191/]The Visitor[/url]
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0200465/]The Bank Job[/url]
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1000771/]Recount[/url]

		--- The Absolute Best
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0780536/]In Bruges[/url]

		--- The Worst
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0443649/]10,000 B.C.[/url]

	------------ Phillips&#039; picks ------------
		--- The Best
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0441773/]Kung Fu Panda[/url]
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1047007/]Young @ Heart[/url]
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0371746/]Iron Man[/url]
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0827517/]Reprise[/url]

		--- The Absolute Best
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0453548/]Snow Angels[/url]

		--- The Worst
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0411061/]88 Minutes[/url] - (dishonorable mention)
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1023111/]Never Back Down[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
Siskel & Ebert and Ebert & Roeper video reviews dating back to 1985 can be found at [url=http://www.atthemoviestv.com/]atthemoviestv.com[/url]
Free [url=http://www.apple.com/podcasting/]Podcasts[/url] of Ebert & Roeper are available at the [url=http://www.apple.com/itunes/]iTunes Music Store[/url]
[url=http://www.rogerebert.com]Roger Ebert reviews[/url]
[url=http://www.suntimes.com/index/roeper.html]Richard Roeper columns[/url]
-------------------------------------------------
